title: Those Who Dream By Day
description: Beware, beware, The Father sees.In a walled-in city of the Congregation, a theocratic nation controlled by Priests under The All-Knowing Father's supervision, a sick girl dreams of escaping to Beyond.Dreams are far from reality when she becomes embroiled with a revolutionary cult, a Priest, and an unlikely ally in the upcoming war.She also discovers that she has the potential to manipulate the course of her world with the help of allies, protect herself and her elderly mother from injustices, and fight oppression on behalf of her people.
